alert.note: Alert for Gallatin; Wabash; White (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 30 at 8:45AM CDT until April 03 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana...Illinois... Wabash River at New Harmony. .The Wabash River at New Harmony is forecast to rise to its crest near 16.3 feet Friday morning, then will fall to below flood stage on Sunday. For the Wabash River...including New Harmony...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING CONTINUES THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at New Harmony. * WHEN...Until late Sunday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 15.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 16.3 feet Friday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday afternoon. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
